title: Ask Video Reason 4 Tutorial DVD 2
description:
Reason version 4 is a virtual studio rack rebuilt from the ground up with all the tools and instruments you need to turn your ideas into music. Morgan Pottruff, aka Morg, author of ASK&#039;s popular Live and Melodyne Tutorial DVDs, returns to show you all the new features of Reason 4; a brand new sequencer, a revolutionary groove tool, a stunning arpeggiator and Thor, the synths to end all synths.

This all-new Mac/PC DVD contains 41 video tutorials totaling more than 5 hours presented in ultra-high quality with an easy to navigate interface. Topics begin with Installation, Preferences, Menus, and Mixer and move through in depth tutorials on the Instruments/Synths, Effects, Apreggiator, Sequencer, ReWire, Sync, and Final Mix. A bonus section rounds out the DVD with two Tips and Tricks segments where Morg puts Reason to work with some clever and inspiring demos to help fuel creativity.

The Reason 4 Tutorial DVD is a great resource for all levels of Reason users.
